title: #123: The Facts of the Sandusky Case
description:
Jim Clemente and Lisa Zambetti discussed convicted serial pedophile Jerry Sandusky and the investigation into whether Penn State officials including Head Football Coach Joe Paterno knew about his offenses and failed to take action.

Jim discussed his analysis of the Freh Report and the concept of grooming from "Nice Guy Acquaintance Offenders" such as Sandusky.

Sorry about some of the sound issues as there was problems with the VOIP during recording.
